hadith.chapter: The Book of Marriage - كتاب النكاح
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثناه ابن نمير، حدثنا أبي، حدثنا سفيان، بهذا الإسناد ولم يذكر فعل عائشة‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Sufyan with the same chain of transmitters, but he made no mention of the act of 'A'isha (being admitted as a wife in the house of the Holy Prophet).
